sentences.sContent: Lincoln did much work on desegregation in USA.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lincoln did much work on desegregation in USA.
sentences.sCn: 林肯在消除种族歧视上做了很多工作。

sentences.sContent: Soon afterward, the president appointed a federal task force to enforce desegregation along Route 40.
sentences.sContent_eng: Soon afterward, the president appointed a federal task force to enforce desegregation along Route 40.
sentences.sCn: 不久以后，肯尼迪成立了一个联邦专责小组来解决40号公路上的种族隔离问题。

remMethod.val: 来自desegregate(v. 取消种族隔离)， de(解除) + segregate(隔离) → 解除隔离 → 取消种族隔离
